info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on API entity and their Operations associated with your Azure API Management deployment.

get.description: Lists all APIs of the API Management service instance.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| description | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| serviceUrl | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| path | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| isCurrent | filter | eq, ne |  |</br>

parameters.name: expandApiVersionSet
parameters.description: Include full ApiVersionSet resource in response

200.description: Paged Result response of Apis.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified API entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the API specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified API entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates new or updates existing specified API of the API Management service instance.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

202.description: Request to create or update API was accepted. Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

200.description: API was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the specified API of the API Management service instance.

200.description: API was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified API of the API Management service instance.

parameters.name: deleteRevisions
parameters.description: Delete all revisions of the Api.

200.description: The API was successfully deleted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all revisions of an API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| apiRevision | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: The operation returns a list of revision details.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all releases of an API. An API release is created when making an API Revision current. Releases are also used to rollback to previous revisions. Results will be paged and can be constrained by the $top and $skip parameters.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| notes | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: The operation returns a list of API Releases.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Returns the etag of an API release.

200.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the api release as specified by its identifier.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns the details of an API release.

200.description: The operation returns the details of an API Release.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new Release for the API.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Release was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the details of the release of the API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Release was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified release in the API.

200.description: API release successfully removed

204.description: API release successfully removed by previous request or does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists a collection of the operations for the specified API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| method | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| description | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| urlTemplate | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: A collection of operation summary entities at the API level.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API operation specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified API operation entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the API Operation specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified Operation entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new operation in the API or updates an existing one.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Operation was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the details of the operation in the API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Operation was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified operation in the API.

200.description: API operation successfully removed

204.description: API operation successfully removed by previous request or does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the list of policy configuration at the API Operation level.

200.description: Api Operations Policy Collection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API operation policy specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified API operation policy entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the API Operation level.

200.description: Api Operation Policy information.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates policy configuration for the API Operation level.

201.description: Api Operation policy configuration was successfully created.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Api Operation policy configuration of the tenant was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the policy configuration at the Api Operation.

200.description: Policy successfully removed

204.description: Policy successfully removed by previous request or does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Tags associated with the Operation.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: The operation returns a collection of tags associated with the Operation entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: Empty response body, ETag header entity state version.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get tag associated with the Operation.

200.description: Gets the details of the tag specified by its identifier.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

201.description: Tag was assigned to the Operation.

200.description: Tag is already assigned to the Operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Detach the tag from the Operation.

200.description: Tag was successfully removed from Operation

204.description: Tag successfully removed by previous request or does not exist in Operation

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Products, which the API is part of.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: The operation returns a collection of products which have the Api entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the API level.

200.description: Apis Policy Collection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API policy specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified API Policy entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the API level.

200.description: Api Policy information.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates policy configuration for the API.

201.description: Api policy configuration was successfully created.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Api policy configuration of the tenant was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the policy configuration at the Api.

200.description: Successfully deleted the policy configuration at the API level.

204.description: Successfully deleted the policy configuration at the API level.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the schema configuration at the API level.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| contentType | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: Apis Schema Collection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the schema specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified schema entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the schema configuration at the API level.

200.description: Api Schema information.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates schema configuration for the API.

202.description: Request to create or update Api schema was accepted.

201.description: Api schema configuration was successfully created.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Api schema configuration of the tenant was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the schema configuration at the Api.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If true removes all references to the schema before deleting it.

200.description: Successfully deleted the schema configuration at the API level.

204.description: Successfully deleted the schema configuration at the API level.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all diagnostics of an API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: Paged Result response of diagnostics for an API.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Operation completed successfully.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified Diagnostic entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new Diagnostic for an API or updates an existing one.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Diagnostic was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the details of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Diagnostic was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Diagnostic from an API.

200.description: Diagnostic successfully removed

204.description: Diagnostic successfully removed by previous request or does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all issues associated with the specified API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| userId | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| state | filter | eq |     |</br>

200.description: Paged Result response of issues for the API.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Issue for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Operation completed successfully.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the Issue for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified Issue entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new Issue for an API or updates an existing one.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Api issue successfully updated

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing issue for an API.

200.description: Api issue updated successfully.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Issue from an API.

200.description: Issue successfully removed

204.description: Issue successfully removed by previous request or does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all comments for the Issue associated with the specified API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| userId | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: Paged Result response of issue comments for the API.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the issue Comment for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Operation completed successfully.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the issue Comment for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified issue Comment entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new Comment for the Issue in an API or updates an existing one.

201.description: New api issue comment successfully added

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Api issue comment successfully updated

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified comment from an Issue.

200.description: Comment successfully removed

204.description: Comment successfully removed by previous request or does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all attachments for the Issue associated with the specified API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| userId | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: Paged Result response of issue attachments for the API.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the issue Attachment for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: Operation completed successfully.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the issue Attachment for an API specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified issue Attachment entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new Attachment for the Issue in an API or updates an existing one.

201.description: New api issue attachment successfully added

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Api issue attachment successfully updated

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified comment from an Issue.

200.description: Attachment successfully removed

204.description: Attachment successfully removed by previous request or does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Tags descriptions in scope of API. Model similar to swagger - tagDescription is defined on API level but tag may be assigned to the Operations

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: The operation returns a collection of tagDescriptions associated with the Api entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: Empty response body, ETag header entity state version.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get Tag description in scope of API

200.description: Gets the description of the tag specified by its identifier in scope if the Api.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create/Update tag description in scope of the Api.

201.description: Tag Description was created for the Api.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Tag Description was updated for the Api.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Delete tag description for the Api.

200.description: Tag description successfully removed

204.description: Tag description successfully removed by previous request or does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Tags associated with the API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: The operation returns a collection of tags associated with the Api entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: Empty response body, ETag header entity state version.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get tag associated with the API.

200.description: Gets the details of the tag specified by its identifier.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

201.description: Tag was assigned to the Api.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Tag is already assigned to the Api.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Detach the tag from the Api.

200.description: API/Tag association successfully removed

204.description: API/Tag association successfully removed by previous request or does not exist

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists a collection of operations associated with tags.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| apiName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| description | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| method | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| urlTemplate | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: Lists a collection of TagResource entities.

get.description: Gets the details of the API specified by its identifier in the format specified to the Storage Blob with SAS Key valid for 5 minutes.

parameters.name: format

values.description: Export the Api Definition in OpenApi Specification 2.0 format to the Storage Blob.
values.name: Swagger

values.description: Export the Api Definition in WSDL Schema to Storage Blob. This is only supported for APIs of Type `soap`
values.name: Wsdl

values.description: Export the Api Definition in WADL Schema to Storage Blob.
values.name: Wadl

values.description: Export the Api Definition in OpenApi Specification 3.0 to Storage Blob.
values.name: Openapi

values.description: Export the Api Definition in OpenApi Specification 3.0 as JSON document to Storage Blob.
values.name: OpenapiJson

parameters.description: Format in which to export the Api Details to the Storage Blob with Sas Key valid for 5 minutes.

parameters.name: export
parameters.description: Query parameter required to export the API details.

200.description: The response contains a stream with a full set of API metadata and includes API entity with an embedded array of operation entities.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
